Articles.Content:
I was thinking about the way I've been playing with contracts. One of the most satisfying things for me has been to take four or five contracts at the same time and to do them all in the same flight. That's meant some fairly radical flight plans, which strike me as being quite in the spirit of the game.

Perhaps that could be something that could be rewarded somehow in the contract system?
You're already getting rewarded by getting the contract awards and bonuses together, but only using a single rocket/vessel to complete all the criteria in one mission (reduced cost).

Additional money doesn't seem like a good idea, you're already saving by combining several missions into one. Not sure extra science makes much sense. Might be better to have a reputation reward, there's no rep bonus for stacking missions in stock currently and it is more impressive the more you can do in a single mission.

Good suggestion and welcome to the forums!
I'd say there already is the bonus of having to finance only one vehicle.
